question: 料理
sourceMnemonic: There is a <kanji>reason</kanji> for this <kanji>fee</kanji> that you have to pay to get in here. We are <vocabulary>cooking</vocabulary> <vocabulary>cuisine</vocabulary> for you to eat while you're watching the show. If we weren't cooking a <vocabulary>dish</vocabulary> for you, we probably wouldn't charge you this fee!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
